text: The Ghost That Never Returns () is a 1930 Soviet drama movie directed by Abram Room.ПРИВИДЕНИЕ, КОТОРОЕ НЕ ВОЗВРАЩАЕТСЯ It stars Boris Ferdinandov, A. Filippov, and Karl Gurnyak. ==Cast== *Boris Ferdinandov - José Real *A. Filippov *Karl Gurnyak *Dmitriy Kara-Dmitriev *Ivan Lavrov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1930 drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Abram Room Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Ghost That Never Returns
